Description: Science and engineering graduate students per 1000 individuals 25-34 years old by state for 1990-2011

Notes: S&E includes students pursuing degrees in physical, computer, agricultural, biological, earth, atmospheric, ocean, and social sciences, psychology, mathematics and engineering

Description: Postdoctorate degree holders in S&E by state
